LanguageData.AYSalt.label: Coarse rock salt
LanguageData.AYSalt.description: A white crystalline salt more commonly known as halite that is the mineral version of "common" salt (Sodium Chloride).
LanguageData.AYBarrelSaltedMeat.label: Barrel (Salted Meat)
LanguageData.AYBarrelSaltedMeat.description: A barrel full of various meats that have been salted to preserve them.
LanguageData.AYSaltedMeat.label: Salted Meat
LanguageData.AYSaltedMeat.description: Meat that has been preserved in salt.
